What is this all about?

A lot of people especially for beginners are having trouble of not knowing what project they should make therefore, I had created this web application to help developers have them an idea for their next project.



Hone Your Skills

While it also aims to help beginners, it also focuses on helping other developers hone their skills and do some challenges.



Feeling Bored?

If you're feeling bored and don't know what to do for the rest of your life then then do these challenges to spark your life a little bit.
